config: We just wanted to drop a note to thank you for being connected with the Justia Connect Pro community for a whole year!  Thanks for choosing to be a part of this community, and we look forward to helping you continue to share, learn, save, and grow over the next year.
You spent years in academic study earning your degrees. You spent countless hours preparing for your bar exam. You've dedicated your professional life to building a successful practice.
You are a Pro.  It is time to make sure your clients know.

Tell them with the Justia Connect Pro Badge in the  Justia Lawyer Directory, exclusively available for serious lawyers committed to growing their practice with the enhanced membership benefits available to Justia Connect Pro members.
